html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-02772025-03-05ESDC, CEIC
ActDepartment of Employment and Social Development Act
Employment Insurance Act
SubjectEmployment Insurance Board of Appeal Regulations
PrecisEMPLOYMENT INSURANCE BOARD OF APPEAL REGULATIONS in order to (1) set out the processes and procedures for Board of Appeal issues such as: filing an appeal, Board of Appeal regions, hearing format, quorum, issuing of decisions, hearings held in private and considerations for hearings that involve allegations of harassment; and (2) provide consistency and transparency to the administrative functions of the Board of Appeal and protect all parties’ rights and obligations for first level Employment Insurance appeals.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0074 Publication Date: 2025-03-26
AttachmentsAttachment
